HelpBalloon.title: Show in online-archive
HelpBalloon.content:
The checkbox Show in online-archive ensures that the mailing is listed in the overview of personalized archives. As soon as the checkbox is ticked a link to the fullview for this mailing and the mailing name are added to the online-archive.

Please regard: Through activating the checkbox the mailing will be shown in the online-archive â€“ independently of the mailing status.

For more information see chapter "Fullview: Always display HTML mails correctly", Paragraph "Creating customized archive for recipients".
